barista_record.SQL_SELECT: SELECT poe_podet.firm_id, poe_pohdr.vendor_id, poe_podet.po_no, poe_podet.wo_no, poe_podet.internal_seq_no, poe_pohdr.ord_date, poe_podet.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, poe_podet.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, poe_podet.order_memo, poe_podet.po_line_code, poc_linecode.line_type[$0a$]FROM poe_podet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_pohdr ON poe_pohdr.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND poe_pohdr.po_no=poe_podet.po_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=poe_podet.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=poe_podet.item_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poc_linecode ON poc_linecode.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND poc_linecode.po_line_code=poe_podet.po_line_code[$0a$]

SELECT pot_pohdr_arc.firm_id, pot_pohdr_arc.po_no, pot_pohdr_arc.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, pot_pohdr_arc.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, pot_pohdr_arc.po_frt_terms, pot_pohdr_arc.ap_ship_via, pot_pohdr_arc.acknowledge, pot_pohdr_arc.fob, pot_pohdr_arc.req_no, pot_pohdr_arc.ord_date, pot_pohdr_arc.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, pot_pohdr_arc.shipto_no[$0a$]FROM pot_pohdr_arc[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=pot_pohdr_arc.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=pot_pohdr_arc.vendor_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=pot_pohdr_arc.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=pot_pohdr_arc.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=pot_pohdr_arc.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=pot_pohdr_arc.customer_id[$0a$]

SELECT pot_reqhdr_arc.firm_id, pot_reqhdr_arc.req_no, pot_reqhdr_arc.po_no, pot_reqhdr_arc.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, pot_reqhdr_arc.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, pot_reqhdr_arc.po_frt_terms, pot_reqhdr_arc.ap_ship_via, pot_reqhdr_arc.acknowledge, pot_reqhdr_arc.fob, pot_reqhdr_arc.ord_date, pot_reqhdr_arc.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, pot_reqhdr_arc.shipto_no[$0a$]FROM pot_reqhdr_arc[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=pot_reqhdr_arc.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=pot_reqhdr_arc.vendor_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=pot_reqhdr_arc.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=pot_reqhdr_arc.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=pot_reqhdr_arc.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=pot_reqhdr_arc.customer_id[$0a$]

SELECT pot_rechdr.firm_id, pot_rechdr.po_no, pot_rechdr.receiver_no, pot_rechdr.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, pot_rechdr.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, pot_rechdr.po_frt_terms, pot_rechdr.ap_ship_via, pot_rechdr.acknowledge, pot_rechdr.fob, pot_rechdr.req_no, poe_reqhdr.vendor_id, pot_rechdr.ord_date, pot_rechdr.recpt_date[$0a$]FROM pot_rechdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=pot_rechdr.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=pot_rechdr.vendor_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=pot_rechdr.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=pot_rechdr.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_reqhdr ON poe_reqhdr.firm_id=pot_rechdr.firm_id AND poe_reqhdr.req_no=pot_rechdr.req_no[$0a$]

SELECT poe_reqdet.firm_id, poe_reqhdr.vendor_id, poe_reqdet.req_no, poe_reqdet.wo_no, poe_reqdet.internal_seq_no, poe_reqhdr.ord_date, poe_reqdet.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, poe_reqdet.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, poe_reqdet.order_memo, poc_linecode.po_line_code, poc_linecode.line_type[$0a$]FROM poe_reqdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_reqhdr ON poe_reqhdr.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND poe_reqhdr.req_no=poe_reqdet.req_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=poe_reqdet.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=poe_reqdet.item_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poc_linecode ON poc_linecode.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND poc_linecode.po_line_code=poe_reqdet.po_line_code[$0a$]
